entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
